titleInfo.title: ‘Route of Lieut. McDonald 12th N.I. Ensign Monteith Engineers. Performed by Order of Brigadier General Malcolm Ambassador to the Court of Persia’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on paperDimensions:462 x 656 mm, on sheet 505 x 702 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures.Routes indicated by thin and dotted lines.Inscriptions:On the recto in the bottom right-hand corner signed by the Surveyor General and ‘C.G. Nicholls’ in the bottom left-hand corner below the neat line.
